experience.title: Field Support Engineer
experience.companyDescription: Integra Tech Support is more than just a tech support staffing agency; we're your strategic ally in navigating the complexities of technology. Our commitment is to empower your enterprise with tailored, certified, boots-on-the-ground tech solutions that address your project's unique needs.
experience.personalNotes: This is the contractor's current position. Contractor is the sole proprietor and sole full-time employee of this company.
experience.jobDuties: Provide high quality support for computer, network, and audio-visual hardware, operating systems, and application software Installation and troubleshooting, configuration, cabling and terminations, system administration, and end-user support across the full range of business, government, healthcare, education, retail, and hospitality sectors.

experience.title: Commissioning Engineer
experience.companyDescription: AVI-SPL is a digital enablement solutions provider that transforms how people and technology connect to elevate experiences, create new value, and enable organizations to thrive and grow. As the leading provider of collaboration technology solutions, which include our award-winning managed services, our highly trained team works hand-in-hand with organizations worldwide—including more than 86% of Fortune 100 companies. Our experienced teams strategize, design, deploy, manage, and support audiovisual (AV) and unified communications (UC) solutions that are simple-to-use, scalable, serviceable, and measurable to ensure business objectives are achieved.
experience.personalNotes: AVI-SPL is the largest and most well-respected Audio-Visual integrator in the world. Applicant gained valuable experience with engineering level Audio-Visual concepts and troubleshooting tools.
experience.jobDuties: Configure, commission, and support complex, multi-room A/V and control systems. Upload and edit code for AV equipment such as (Biamp QSC/BSS/ClearOne). Upload, debug, and edit code for control systems (Crestron/Extron/AMX), matrix mixers and switchers, VTC (Cisco/Polycom Troubleshoot using standard AV technician's toolkit. Understand advanced system drawings, specifications and technical manuals. Read, redline generate new drawings, schematics, and rack elevations. Provide world-class customer service and training.

experience.title: IT Support Engineer
experience.companyDescription: Located in Grayslake, Illinois, Johnson Computer Services provides professional Grayslake computer repair and Grayslake cell phone repair services. Are you a resident of Grayslake or the surrounding communities in Lake County, Illinois? Do you need expert and efficient electronic device repair services for your cell phone, laptop computer, desktop computer, tablet, or gaming console? If so, Johnson Computer Services is here to help. As a leading technology repair provider in Grayslake and nearby towns, we offer premium computer repair and cell phone repair services done right. Our certified technicians are committed to providing quality repairs and support for any electronic device issues with a focus on customer satisfaction and fast turnaround times.
experience.jobDuties: Install, troubleshoot, and repair different types of issues affecting consumer and enterprise computer systems, servers, and networks. Disassemble and reassemble laptops, tablets, gaming consoles, and phones to perform advanced, component-level upgrades and repairs Provide Zendesk powered support and asset management for business clients.

exampleGreetings.title: Serial Cable Replacement

company.name: Brandpoint Services
company.description: It's about keeping you connected with your customers, teams and partners wherever they go. Whether you're looking to educate and motivate customers at the point-of-purchase, or keep communication open  throughout an office, we help brands engage with their audiences through large format displays like  video walls, menu boards , projectors, kiosks, interactive displays and POS across the US and Canada.

exampleGreetings.description: The Cafe Menu video left media player needs serial cable (RS-232) replacement. S/N(D3E995001070)
exampleGreetings.greeting:
Greetings! I am a field support specialist specializing in pro AV with an extensive amount of experience diagnosing and repairing AV control systems of all types. I have a full kit of serial RS-232 testers, adapters, and cables, can easily identify the affected control cable(s) and provide a fix with no issues. I am also highly professional, reliable, organized, and always a customer favorite! Please see my LinkedIn linked below for a more detailed overview of my work history and experience. Thank you for your time and consideration, have great day!

www.linkedin.com/in/jsherrick

exampleGreetings.title: Troubleshoot HDMI connection

company.name: Netfor
company.description:
From retail to commercial and beyond, Netfor Field Services specializes in installing and managing technologies that keep businesses humming - and customers singing your praises. Whatever your technology needs - badge readers, cameras, cabling, networking, menu boards, drive-thru timers, headsets, and more - one of our reliable field service technicians is always nearby.
Netfor has dozens of skilled experts, thousands of technicians nationwide, a state-of-the-art fulfillment center, and multiple locations sprinkled throughout the United States. Still true to our DNA, Netfor is committed to simplifying complex business processes and helping organizations focus on what they do best.

exampleGreetings.description:
MUST: Review SOW and ALL Requirements. Only apply if you fully understand what is needing to be completed. Ask questions if you should have any.
***** *******
Support: (SEE CONFIDENTIAL INFO)
TECH MUST CHECK IN AND OUT WITH A MERCY HOUSING CONTACT
Scope of Work:
The tech will need to reach out to Angela Pierce or the Property Manager once they arrive for the location of the TV.
PM: Shanita McAbee-
Phone: ***** ********
SOW:
TV displaying “No Signal” staff are not able to reconnect HDMI cable
Remove TV from wall mount replace/reconnect HDMI cable
CHECK IN/OUT PROCEDURE
Must arrive onsite at the scheduled time (call Netfor for any unforeseen issues)
Check In via FE Portal
Check In with Netfor at  800-908-0226 opt. 1
Check In with ***** *******
Complete installation per SOW.  Do not deviate away from the requested SOW unless you are authorized by Netfor.  If you are requested to complete additional work, inform Netfor immediately.  Document who requested the additional scope.  Without this we will not be able to pay and/or bill extra time.
Must check out with ***** *************
Enter detailed close out notes. What was completed onsite? What issues did you have? If you cross connected lines, they need to be labeled and documented.
Have POC sign off on work order documenting check in and out times.
NOTE: *** WE CANNOT PAY YOU FOR YOUR WORK WITHOUT ALL DELIVERABLES AND SIGN OFF SHEET SIGNED BY MANAGER ***
Check Out on Field Engineer (FN) Portal 
Check out with Netfor at 800-908-0226 opt. 1
TOOLS/MATERIALS
Prepare tool bag/box with the following:
Laptop (Windows 7 or higher)
Basic IT Tools
Network Testing Tools/Cable Testers
8' Ladder
Cat5e Cabling
Digital Camera / Camera Phone with this ability to send pictures before leaving site
Copy of work order and job information
Any other tools/materials you may think you need to complete the job on the first visit.
Ensure a clean and wrinkle free uniform is ready:
Long pants
Collared shirt
Netfor name badge
Close toe shoes
Review SOW and inform Netfor of any question prior to arriving on site.
REQUIRED DELIVERABLES
Signed Work Order with Date and Times
Pictures of area before working
Pictures of all equipment or cabling installed
Pictures of area once work is completed (showing area cleaned up)
Notes:
If you are unable to reach Gloria and it's an emergency, please reach out to the other Mercy Housing POC (Listed in confidential section)
Failure to call and notify Netfor could result in being blocked for future work.  We take being notified very seriously so we have time to notify the client.

Hello! I am a field support engineer specializing in pro AV, with over 10 years experience working with some of the biggest integrators in the industry, I can troubleshoot, diagnose, resolve the issue, and provide detailed documentation of the full step by step problem remediation. Please see my LinkedIn, linked below, for a more detailed overview of my work history and expertise. Thank you for your time and consideration, I hope to work with you soon!
Linkedin.com/in/jsherrick

exampleGreetings.title: Wall-To-Wall Inventory - Site 45

company.name: Argus IT Services
company.description: Argus provides industry leading electronic hardware 'lifecycle management', including imaging and preparation of new systems, management of end of life systems, data destruction services, management of electronic waste or e-waste streams, asset repurposing targeting the “digital divide”, and information technology project services. We also specialize in IT staffing services with services ranging from Help Desk Personnel to Systems Programmers and Project Managers to Hardware Technicians and everything in-between.

exampleGreetings.description:
We are looking for Smart Hands IT Technicians to perform a detailed, wall-to-wall inventory of all Network Equipment located at several Office Buildings & Distribution Sites across the East Coast. The following is the specific scope items to perform, and information and photos expected to be captured:
Critical Scope of Work:
Wall to Wall IT Network Equipment Data Collection.
Tech will be expected to Document all available IT Equipment at the customer site.
Including but not limited to the following:
A Survey Document attached will be the deliverable and will include the following:
Device Host Name (were available)
IP Address (were available)
Model Number
Serial Number
MDF/IDF # (location)
Power Status of all network equipment at the site
Other required fields
Photos of each/all MDF/IDF will be required
Photos of Front and Back of MDF/IDF, without disrupting any cables / connections.
Pasted into the attached Survey Document
Tech is expected to document the details of any Spare IT Network Equipment available at the location.
Using the attached Survey Document
Tech is expected to document the Total number of Wireless Access Points (Aps) installed at the location.
Using the attached Survey Document
All Inventory Will be Documented on attached Standard Template.
Tech will be required to attend a brief training call to understand the Survey Template Requirements.
exampleGreetings.greeting:
Greetings! I am a CompTIA Network+ certified field technician with an abundance of hands on experience with all makes and models of network equipment, and will be able to easily identify all equipment to be inventoried, accurately logging all required data such as serial numbers, if needed. Please see my LinkedIn for a more detailed overview of my work history and experience. Thank you for your consideration, and have a great day!
www.linkedin.com/in/jsherrick
